verses.verse: SHa'ul <WG3972>, a servant <WG1401> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG1161> an emissary <WG652> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, according to <WG2596> the faith <WG4102> of 'Elohim's <WG2316> elect <WG1588>, and <WG2532> the acknowledging <WG1922> of the truth <WG225> which <WG3588> is after <WG2596> godliness <WG2150>;
In <WG1909> hope <WG1680> of eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>, which <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316>, that cannot lie <WG893>, promised <WG1861> <WG5662> before <WG4253> the world <WG166> began <WG5550>;

But <WG1161> hath <WG5319> in due <WG2398> times <WG2540> manifested <WG5319> <WG5656> his <WG846> word <WG3056> through <WG1722> preaching <WG2782>, which <WG3739> is committed <WG4100> <WG5681> unto me <WG1473> according to <WG2596> the Mitzvah <WG2003> of 'Elohim <WG2316> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>;

To Titus <WG5103>, mine own <WG1103> son <WG5043> after <WG2596> the common <WG2839> faith <WG4102>: Grace <WG5485>, mercy <WG1656>, and peace <WG1515>, from <WG575> 'Elohim <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>.

For this <WG5127> cause <WG5484> left I <WG2641> <WG5627> thee <WG4571> in <WG1722> Crete <WG2914>, that <WG2443> thou shouldest set in order <WG1930> <WG5672> the things that are wanting <WG3007> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> ordain <WG2525> <WG5661> elders <WG4245> in every <WG2596> city <WG4172>, as <WG5613> I <WG1473> had appointed <WG1299> <WG5668> thee <WG4671>:

If any <WG1536> be <WG2076> <WG5748> blameless <WG410>, the husband <WG435> of one <WG3391> wife <WG1135>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> faithful <WG4103> children <WG5043> not <WG3361> accused <WG1722> <WG2724> of riot <WG810> or <WG2228> unruly <WG506>.

For <WG1063> a bishop <WG1985> must <WG1163> <WG5748> be <WG1511> <WG5750> blameless <WG410>, as <WG5613> the steward <WG3623> of 'Elohim <WG2316>; not <WG3361> selfwilled <WG829>, not <WG3361> soon angry <WG3711>, not <WG3361> given to wine <WG3943>, no <WG3361> striker <WG4131>, not <WG3361> given to filthy lucre <WG146>;
But <WG235> a lover of hospitality <WG5382>, a lover of good men <WG5358>, sober <WG4998>, just <WG1342>, holy <WG3741>, temperate <WG1468>;

Holding fast <WG472> <WG5740> the faithful <WG4103> word <WG3056> as <WG2596> he hath been taught <WG1322>, that <WG2443> he may be <WG5600> <WG5753> able <WG1415> by <WG1722> sound <WG5198> <WG5723> doctrine <WG1319> both <WG2532> to exhort <WG3870> <WG5721> and <WG2532> to convince <WG1651> <WG5721> the gainsayers <WG483> <WG5723>.
For <WG1063> there are <WG1526> <WG5748> many <WG4183> unruly <WG506> and <WG2532> vain talkers <WG3151> and <WG2532> deceivers <WG5423>, specially <WG3122> they of <WG1537> the b'ritmilah <WG4061>:

Whose <WG3739> mouths <WG1993> must <WG1163> <WG5748> be stopped <WG1993> <WG5721>, who <WG3748> subvert <WG396> <WG5719> whole <WG3650> houses <WG3624>, teaching <WG1321> <WG5723> things which <WG3739> they ought <WG1163> <WG5748> not <WG3361>, for <WG5484> filthy <WG150> lucre's <WG2771> sake <WG5484>.

One <WG5100> of <WG1537> themselves <WG846>, even a prophet <WG4396> of their <WG846> own <WG2398>, said <WG2036> <WG5627>, The Cretians <WG2912> are alway <WG104> liars <WG5583>, evil <WG2556> beasts <WG2342>, slow <WG692> bellies <WG1064>.

This <WG3778> witness <WG3141> is <WG2076> <WG5748> true <WG227>. Wherefore <WG1223> <WG3739> <WG156> rebuke <WG1651> <WG5720> them <WG846> sharply <WG664>, that <WG2443> they may be sound <WG5198> <WG5725> in <WG1722> the faith <WG4102>;
Not <WG3361> giving heed <WG4337> <WG5723> to Jewish <WG2451> fables <WG3454>, and <WG2532> Mitzvot <WG1785> of men <WG444>, that turn from <WG654> <WG5734> the truth <WG225>.

Unto the pure <WG2513> all things <WG3956> are pure <WG3303> <WG2513>: but <WG1161> unto them that are defiled <WG3392> <WG5772> and <WG2532> unbelieving <WG571> is nothing <WG3762> pure <WG2513>; but <WG235> even <WG2532> their <WG846> mind <WG3563> and <WG2532> conscience <WG4893> is defiled <WG3392> <WG5769>.

They profess <WG3670> <WG5719> that they know <WG1492> <WG5760> 'Elohim <WG2316>; but <WG1161> in works <WG2041> they deny <WG720> <WG5736> him, being <WG5607> <WG5752> abominable <WG947>, and <WG2532> dis`Ovedient <WG545>, and <WG2532> unto <WG4314> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041> reprobate <WG96>.
